InboxPage.title: Inbox
InboxPage.selectConversationDescription: Choose a conversation from the list to start messaging
InboxPage.whatsappWindowExpired: The 24-hour reply window has expired. You can only send template messages or wait for the customer's next message.

upgrade.title: Choose Your Perfect Plan
upgrade.subtitle: Unlock the full potential of SimplyBox with advanced features designed for your business growth

1.question: Can I change my plan anytime?
1.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan anytime. The change will take effect immediately.

2.question: What happens to my data if I downgrade?
2.answer: Your data will always be safe. You will only have access to fewer features based on your new plan.

3.question: Do you offer refunds?
3.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for all paid plans.

4.question: Are there any setup fees?
4.answer: No setup fees. You only pay the monthly subscription fee for the selected plan.

help.title: Need help choosing the right plan?
help.description: Our team is ready to help you find the perfect solution for your business.

professionalFeature.description: Activity management is available for Professional plan users. Track follow-ups, schedule tasks, and monitor team activities.

existingTags.title: Existing Tags ({{count}})
existingTags.description: Edit name, color, or delete existing tags (Global tags cannot be deleted)

bestPractices.title: Tag Best Practices
bestPractices.shortNames: Keep tag names short and consistent
bestPractices.colorGrouping: Use colors to group related tags (e.g., all sales stages in green)
bestPractices.reviewTags: Regularly review and clean up unused custom tags
bestPractices.businessSegments: Consider creating tags for different business segments

TeamManagementPage.ownerDescription: The owner has full control over the workspace.

TeamManagementPage.confirmRemovalDescription: Are you sure you want to remove this team member? This action cannot be undone.

FilesPage.title: Knowledge Base
FilesPage.description: Upload and manage your company files for AI-based responses.
FilesPage.approachingLimitDescription: You're using {{used}} of {{total}} files. Consider upgrading for more capacity.
FilesPage.noFilesDescription: Upload your first file to start building your knowledge base.
FilesPage.confirmDeleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this file? This action cannot be undone.

uploadModal.title: Add New Knowledge File
uploadModal.description: Upload a file to your knowledge base for AI-based customer responses.
uploadModal.dragDropText: Drag and drop your file here
uploadModal.acceptedFilesText: Accepted: PDF, DOCX, TXT, up to 10MB
uploadModal.descriptionPlaceholder: Example: Refund policy update for September 2025
uploadModal.successDescription: Your file has been processed and added to the knowledge base.
uploadModal.unsupportedFileTypeError: Unsupported file type. Please upload a PDF, DOCX, or TXT file.
uploadModal.fileTooLargeError: File is too large. Maximum size is 10MB. Your file is {{size}}MB.
uploadModal.duplicateFileError: A file named "{{name}}" already exists in your knowledge base.
